title: Bitcoin jumps 3% on reports that Trump will opt for fewer tariffs than expected
description: Trump’s stance on tariffs has led investors to flee risky assets like crypto in recent weeks.

title: Bitcoin in the bush - the crypto mine in remote Zambia
description: Bitcoin miners will go to remote locations to take advantage of cheap electricity.

title: Donald Trump’s crypto business launched a dollar coin called USD1: What we know so far
description: His family’s crypto project, World Liberty Financial, implicitly confirmed the launch on Monday.

title: US lifts sanctions on Tornado Cash, a crypto mixer linked to North Korean money laundering
description: Tornado Cash was used to launder billions in stolen crypto, according to the Treasury.

title: Bitcoin Depot names David Gray as CFO
